paper.title: The Study of Mobile E-portfolio Architecture
paper.abstract: The goal of this study is to improve the management and data update of traditional learning portfolio. Learning portfolio can be classified into two types: process portfolio and product portfolio. Traditional learning portfolio has difficulties on storage, management, information standardization, etc. E-portfolio solves partial problems of traditional learning portfolio. However, for the present application of e-portfolio, most learners use product portfolio, a passive portfolio. Active learning portfolio which can record students' learning process such as class attendance, activity participation or library record which are classified as real-time data is less explored. Thus, this study hopes to achieve the goal through combining cloud network with mobile devices with camera.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是教育领域中的电子学习档案（E-portfolio）的管理和数据更新，特别是通过结合云网络和移动设备来改进学习过程记录。虽然提到了'portfolio'一词，但这里的'portfolio'指的是学习档案，而非金融领域的投资组合。因此，该论文的核心技术与上述金融研究领域无关。
